name: Jolie Mineral Photo Touch Concealer Cover Up Camouflage Stick (Light)
short_description: The ultimate full coverage concealer for camera-ready & flawless skin. Advanced Skin Optic Light technology diffuses and camouflage dark circles and blemishes, while smoothing out fine lines.
Ultra-creamy, weightless concealer melts into skin with longwearing medium to full coverage. Glides on easily and provides a velvet smooth finish.
Erases, conceals, brightens and contours with ease. Imperfections appear blended away without creasing or settling into fine lines.
Unique, patented luminescent particles release and diffuse visible light, taking focus away from skin imperfections.
Paraben free, fragrance free, talc free, oil free, dye free. Cruelty free. Not tested on animals.
product_description: Enhance the camera ready finish with this this truly innovative mineral concealer. Ultra-creamy stick glides on with zero drag to deliver hours of full coverage for dark circles and blemishes. Crease-proof, humidity-resistant formula conceals, corrects, and contours with ease. Skin Optic Light Technology, light-reflective minerals and line filling Corrective Micro-Spheres delivers the ultimate in camouflage. Rich in Vitamins, A, C & E and Squalane, the Mineral Photo Touch Concealer conditions, nourishes and hydrates skin whilst providing protection against environmental aggressors. Dark circles, blemishes and fine lines virtually disappear. Packaged in a travel smart stick applicator. Paraben Free. SHADE REFERENCE; Light: Very fair with neutral undertone. Light/Medium: Light with yellow undertone. Medium: Medium with yellow undertone. Light Peach: Light with peachy undertone. Medium Peach: Medium with peachy undertone. Warm Honey: Medium deep with peachy undertone. Soft Shell: Light with neutral undertone. Medium Neutral: Medium with neutral undertone.

name: Well People Supernatural Complexion Stick Foundation + Concealer, Buildable, Light-to-Medium Coverage, Soft Matte Finish, Lightweight + Hydrating, Multi-Use, Vegan & Cruelty-Free, 14 Fair Neutral
short_description: FOUNDATION + CONCEALER HYBRID: A multi-use complexion stick that your skin will love. This lightweight, creamy foundation and concealer hybrid delivers buildable, light-to-medium coverage and a soft matte finish that’s ideal for spot coverage or all-over wear. Features an easy-to-use stick format and domed bullet head that are perfect for on-the-go touch-ups.
LIGHTWEIGHT FORMULA: Skin-balancing formula helps to moisturize, soften, absorb excess oil, and even out skin tone for brighter skin over time.

HOW TO USE: To apply, simply swipe the complexion stick onto your forehead, chin and cheeks. Then, use clean fingers or a makeup brush (like our Buffing Brush) to diffuse the formula into a soft, matte finish. You can also use it as a spot concealer to cover up imperfections or dark circles.

PLANT-POWERED INGREDIENTS: Made with Bamboo Stem Powder which absorbs excess oil and mattifies the look of skin, Black Cumin Seed Oil which helps to brighten and even out the look of skin, and an Antioxidant Botanical Blend which moisturizes and softens skin.

WELL PEOPLE: Clean Beauty Powered By Plants.​ This skincare product is dermatologist-developed, vegan, and cruelty-free. Well People is both PETA Cruelty Free and Leaping Bunny certified. Well People products are pregnancy friendly.
product_description: What it is: A moisturizing foundation and concealer stick that delivers buildable, light-to-medium coverage, a soft matte finish and skincare benefits. Why you’ll love it: Lightweight concealer and foundation stick that helps to moisturize, brighten, even out skin tone and absorb excess oil Delivers buildable, light-to-medium coverage and a soft matte finish Versatile makeup stick that’s perfect for spot coverage and an all-over application Enriched with bamboo stem powder, black cumin seed oil and an antioxidant botanical blend Easy-to-use stick format and domed bullet head for touch-ups on the go Available in 15 flexible shades to suit a wide range of skin tones A multi-use complexion stick that your skin will love. This lightweight, creamy foundation and concealer hybrid delivers buildable, light-to-medium coverage and a soft matte finish that’s ideal for spot coverage or all-over wear. Enriched with oil-absorbing bamboo stem powder, black cumin seed oil and an antioxidant botanical blend, the skin-balancing formula helps to moisturize, soften and even out skin tone for brighter skin over time. Features an easy-to-use stick format and domed bullet head that are perfect for on-the-go touch-ups. Plant-powered ingredients: Bamboo Stem Powder: Absorbs excess oil and mattifies the look of skin Black Cumin Seed Oil: Helps to brighten and even out the look of skin Antioxidant Botanical Blend: Moisturizes and softens skin All Well People products are free from parabens, avobenzone, oxybenzone, GMOs, phthalates, sulfates, synthetic fragrance, phenoxyethanol, dimethicone, petrolatum, PEG, propylene glycol, mineral oil, talc, nanoparticles, as well as thousands of other potentially toxic ingredients. Choose well, play clean. This makeup product is dermatologist-developed, vegan, and cruelty-free. Well People is both PETA Cruelty Free and Leaping Bunny certified with 100+ EWG Verified products. Well People is proud to partner with Fair Trade USA™ and manufacture products in Fair Trade Certified™ facilities. Look for the Fair Trade Certified™ seal on your Well People product! Well People products are pregnancy friendly. We formulate without Phthalates, Parabens, Oxybenzone, Triclosan, Phenols, Retinoids and Hydroquinone. We recommend always checking with a doctor before using any products while pregnant or breastfeeding.

name: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Pro Fix Stick Correcting Concealer, Buildable Medium Coverage Concealer Stick - Pink
short_description: Creamy Concealer: Our creamy crease-resistant formula is infused with hyaluronic acid for the smoothest glide ever. Never dry & never draggy. With a buildable medium-coverage concealer formula with 12-hour hydration for a natural skin-like finish.

Color Correcting Made Easy: Our 6 color correcting concealer shades for all skin tones and 18 complexion concealer stick shades help conceal & brighten like a pro. Fix dullness, redness, blemishes, dark spots, undereye circles, and discoloration

Face From Foundation To Finish: Complete your makeup look with our full line of face products to aid in color correction and coverage from concealer, blush, bronzer, foundations and contouring to palettes and powders

Cruelty Free Cosmetics: We believe animals belong in our arms, not in a lab; All of our makeup is certified and acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty free brand; We don't test any of our products on animals

Discover NYX Professional Makeup: Try all of our professional makeup products today from eyeshadow, eyeliner, and false lashes to liquid lipstick, lip gloss, primer, concealer, setting sprays and eyebrow makeup
product_description: The quickest way to fix it all! Master the color-correcting techniques that have dominated your for you page! Get your fix on with a wide range of shades for all needs and skin tones. Correct, conceal, and brighten in a swipe! Color correcting made easy with 6 color correctors for all skin tones and 18 complexion shades to conceal & brighten like a pro. Fix dullness, redness, blemishes, dark spots, undereye circles, and discoloration for all skin tones and all skin types. After color correcting, layer on the complexion shades as needed to conceal & brighten. These comfortable 12-hour wear complexion shades layer flawlessly under and over foundation for a full-face fix. Crease-resistant, medium coverage with a natural finish! Infused with hyaluronic acid for the smoothest glide that’s never dry! A guide to our color correcting shade - 0.1 Green: neutralizes redness on light to medium skin tones. 0.2 Pink: brightens and conceals discoloration on fair to medium skin tones. 0.3 Yellow: brightens and conceals discoloration on fair to light skin tones. 0.4 Dark peach: brightens and conceals discoloration on medium to deep skin tones. 0.5 Apricot: conceals hyperpigmentation and offsets dark areas on deep skin tones. 0.6 Brick red: corrects deep discoloration on rich deep skin tones.

name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrating Concealer Stick, Oil-Free, Lightweight Cover-Up Makeup with Hyaluronic Acid Refreshes Dry Skin & Provides Buildable Coverage, 10 Fair, 0.12 Oz
short_description: Neutrogena Hydro Boost 0.12-ounce Hydrating Concealer Makeup stick in the shade Fair 10 to help hydrate & refresh dry, thirsty skin while providing smooth & buildable coverage

This under eye concealer is formulated with a unique hydrating core designed to instantly quench dry skin. The cover-up makeup helps mask facial imperfections such as redness & dark under eye circles & offers smooth coverage that blends effortlessly

The cover-up is formulated with purified hyaluronic acid, an essential hydrator naturally found in skin & recognized by dermatologists, that binds to water & holds it within skin's surface for more supple & smooth skin

Tested by ophthalmologists, the gentle makeup is suitable for sensitive eyes & contact lens wearers. The lightweight foundation blends effortlessly to hide dark circles & imperfections for a fresh look all day

Available in 5 blendable makeup shades, the non-greasy, lightweight, oil-free & non-comedogenic concealer covers flaws & imperfections with an effortlessly smooth application. The concealer stick won't leave a cakey finish & offers buildable coverage
product_description: Hydrate & refresh your dry, thirsty skin with Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrating Concealer Stick. The lightweight concealer stick features a hydrating core designed to instantly quench skin & flawlessly masks facial imperfections, such as redness & dark under-eye circles, without a cakey finish. The cover-up is formulated with purified hyaluronic acid, an essential hydrator naturally found in skin that binds to water & holds it within skin's surface, to leave skin feeling quenched & more supple & smooth. This concealer is non-greasy, oil-free, & non-comedogenic & has a lightweight formula that glides onto skin providing silky-smooth, natural-looking coverage. To use in your daily beauty routine, apply the full coverage concealer under your eyes or to any facial imperfections. It has been ophthalmologist tested & is safe for sensitive eyes & contact lens wearers. The hydrating concealer stick is available in five blendable shades designed to match multiple skin tones.

name: Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Eraser Dark Circles Treatment Multi-Use Concealer, 120, 1 Count (Packaging May Vary)
short_description: Maybelline Instant Age Rewind Concealer: America's Number 1 Concealer; Erase the look of dark circles, correct the appearance of redness and brighten the look of dull skin. Can be used in multiple shades to contour and highlight.

Anti-Aging Concealer: Turn back time with this anti-aging under eye treatment concealer infused with Haloxyl; Say bye bye to the look of fine lines, blemishes, redness, and dark circles, and hello to a radiant, well rested, refreshed looking eye area

Best Face Forward: Maybelline has sheer, medium, and full coverage foundation in liquid and powder foundation formulas, and a range of concealers, face primers, contour, highlighter, and pressed and setting powder to help you create a perfect canvas

Create any look with Maybelline; foundation, BB creams, concealers, and setting powders for the perfect canvas, eye shadows, mascara, brow pencils, and eyeliners for any eye look and lip products, from showstopping lipstick to plumping lip gloss
product_description: This dark circle eraser concealer instantly creates a radiant, refreshed looking eye area. Infused with goji berry and Haloxyl. Packaging may vary, what you receive may not be what is reflected on site. Instantly erases the appearance of dark circles and fine lines. Under eye concealer visibly diminishes the appearance of puffiness. Eye area looks radiant and refreshed. Anti-aging dark circle treatment contains goji berry and haloxyl to help erase appearance of dark circles and fine lines Step 1. Twist collar of the applicator until the concealer is visible on the sponge (may take some turns on first use). Step 2. Apply concealer to the under-eye area and blend. Step 3. For extreme dark circles, apply the Neutralizer under concealer. Step 4. To add luminosity, apply the Brightener to the inner corner of eyes, cheek, brow bones and bridge of the nose. The Dark Circles Eraser is protected by an anti-microbial system. Do not wet applicator. Wipe off excess eye concealer with dry tissue.
